    • Constructor Detail

      • AAFFile

        public AAFFile(FileDescriptor aafFile)
        throws NullPointerException

        Creates and initilizes an AAF file from a Java file descriptor. This method makes no attempt to check the validity of the given file descriptor or whether the file it specifies exists and can be accessed.

        Parameters:
        aafFile - File descriptor for an AAF file.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Argument is null.

    • Method Detail

      • castFromInterface

        public static final AAFFile castFromInterface(AAFFile alien)
                                       throws NullPointerException

        Cast a AAFFile value from the generic interface to this implementation of the interface. If the given value is not a native implementation, a copy will be instanciated using get and set methods.

        Parameters:
        alien - A potentially alien implementation of an instance of the AAFFile interface.
        Returns:
        Instance of this class that is equal to the given value and that is an instance of this concrete implementation.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Argument is null.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws NotOpenException
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        Dissociates this AAFFile from its storage. Any AAF objects which were contained within this object will then no longer be available to the client.

        If the client is maintaining any references to any objects which are contained in this object, those objects will be marked as dissociated, and methods on them will fail.

        Any unsaved changes will be written to the file before the close operation is complete.

        Specified by:
        close in interface AAFFile
        Throws:
        NotOpenException - This object is not already open.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.close()

      • getDictionary

        public DictionaryImpl getDictionary()
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        Returns the dictionary that contains all types of AAF definition objects for the file. Note that the dictionary is automatically created when the preface is created.

        Specified by:
        getDictionary in interface AAFFile
        Returns:
        The dictionary of this file.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.getDictionary()

      • getPreface

        public PrefaceImpl getPreface()
                       throws NotOpenException,
                              NoPrefaceException
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        Returns the preface associated with this file. If this object has never been associated with a file, a new empty preface will be created and returned. Note that the preface is automatically created when the file object is created.

        Specified by:
        getPreface in interface AAFFile
        Returns:
        Preface of the file.
        Throws:
        NotOpenException - The object is not open.
        NoPrefaceException - The object contains no preface.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.getPreface()

      • getRevision

        public FileRev getRevision()
                    throws NotOpenException
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        Returns the revision of the file.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        Revision of the file.
        Throws:
        NotOpenException - The object is not open.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.getRevision()

      • open

        public void open()
          throws AlreadyOpenException
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        Associates this AAFFile with the storage to which it is to be associated. It will then be possible to access objects within this file.

        Specified by:
        open in interface AAFFile
        Throws:
        AlreadyOpenException - This object has already been opened.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.open()

      • save

        public void save()
          throws NotOpenException,
                 WrongOpenModeException,
                 InsufficientSpaceException
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        If this AAFFile is open, all unsaved changes made to the contents of this object are saved.

        Specified by:
        save in interface AAFFile
        Throws:
        NotOpenException - The object is not open.
        WrongOpenModeException - This object is not open for writing or modification.
        InsufficientSpaceException - There is insufficient space in the storage to save the contents of this object.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.save()

      • saveCopyAs

        public void saveCopyAs(AAFFile destFile)
                throws NotOpenException,
                       NotWriteableException
        Description copied from interface: AAFFile

        Copies the contents of this file to a given destination file. Requires that the destination file be open, writable or modifiable, and not yet contain any objects.

        Specified by:
        saveCopyAs in interface AAFFile
        Parameters:
        destFile - File to receive a copy of the contents of this file.
        Throws:
        NotOpenException - The destination file is not open.
        NotWriteableException - The destination file cannot be written. One reason may be that it already contains objects.
        See Also:
        AAFFile.saveCopyAs(tv.amwa.maj.model.AAFFile)
